title: The Muffin Man
short_plot_summary: The Muffin Man is a popular nursery rhyme that tells the story of a baker who lives on Drury Lane and bakes delicious muffins.
explanation: A chef, representing the Muffin Man, who is a baker
A muffin, symbolizing the delicious muffins made by the Muffin Man
A house, indicating the home of the Muffin Man on Drury Lane
A road, representing Drury Lane where the Muffin Man lives
A person raising their hand, referencing the question 'Do you know the Muffin Man?' asked in the song
